ComicInfo.Summary: Twilight Guardian, the lone defender of her suburban neighborhood, has often longed for contemporaries to share crime-fighting tactics with. When she is invited to a local comic convention to join a league of Real Life Superheroes, Twilight Guardian becomes embroiled in solving a heinous crime that will require their collective talents to solve!
ComicInfo.Tags: Captain Community,Dr. Double-Danger,Vermilion Claw,The Real Super Hero Team of America,Strong Right Arm of Justice,Wendy City,Wisconsin,Twilight Guardian
